title: Bean Quest
mission: Bean Quest is a local electronic DJ event at the Vision Quest Brewery in Boulder, CO

missionGoals.title: Live Electronic DJs
missionGoals.description: Bean Quest features several live (and local) electronic DJs from Boulder and Denver.

missionGoals.title: Beer
missionGoals.description: Bean Quest takes place at the Vision Quest brewery in Boulder, CO. There is a great selection of beer to choose from!

missionGoals.title: Dancing
missionGoals.description: Dance all you want at Bean Quest! There is plenty of room to dance and enjoy the music.

missionGoals.title: Free
missionGoals.description: This event is 100% free to attend. No cover charge, no ticket required. Just show up and enjoy the music - oh and buy beer!

missionGoals.title: Friends
missionGoals.description: This is a community event made by friends, for friends. Bring your friends and make new ones too!

missionGoals.title: Lights and Action
missionGoals.description: Lights, camera, action! We have lights, a fog machine, and all the works to make it more fun!

contactDescription: Contact information for the Bean Quest Events
contactInformation: The best way to get in contact with us is via email: bean-quest@birki.io
